Title: Pruning The Pack
Description:
<Nesingwary gestures to the side of the path.>

See those imprints in the snow? 

Yeti tracks. 

Something must of riled them up to hunt this close to the road. See if you can't hunt down their pack leader. We don't want them to start ambushing travellers! 

If he's a particularly mean brute, collect his head. That should dissuade the others.
ObjectivesText: Hunt down Yetor near Ronin's Shield.
PortraitGiverText: The only thing worse than a big yeti is a big yeti with friends.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak to Hemet Nesingwary Jr. in Camp Nowhere.
